it.polimi.se2018.utils

Class TimerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.TimerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TimerThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Simple timeout with callback.

    Since java doesn't provide callback, caller class must implement TimerCallback Interface. This class define a single thread.

    Author:
    Matteo Formentin, DavideMammarella

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimerThread

        public TimerThread(TimerCallback timerCallback,
                   long timeout)
        Timer Constructor.
        Parameters:
        timerCallback - server interface, used as controller to communicate with the server.
        timeout - timeout used to impose a time limit on login before starting a game.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runner for Timer Thread. While loop use AtomicBoolean in order to permit a clean managing of the thread.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
